N

nextId() - Method in class bomberman.model.Game
Allocates a new player id and returns it.
NoDistributableElementsException - Exception in utils
Thrown when a Distributer can not distribute an item because it has no tiems left.
NoDistributableElementsException() - Constructor for exception utils.NoDistributableElementsException
Creates a new instance.
NoDistributableElementsException(String) - Constructor for exception utils.NoDistributableElementsException
Creates a new instance with an error message.
NoHandlerForThisCommandException - Exception in bomberman.controller.exception
Exception which indicates that there is no handler for an command which was issued by calling Controller.handle(bomberman.controller.commands.Command).
NoHandlerForThisCommandException() - Constructor for exception bomberman.controller.exception.NoHandlerForThisCommandException
Creates a new exception without any information.
NoHandlerForThisCommandException(String) - Constructor for exception bomberman.controller.exception.NoHandlerForThisCommandException
Creates a new exception with a message.
